item.title: Donald Trump : A True Hero in United States
item.description: Donald Trump news today is the, He is the only President in American history that has been accused twice for insurrection incitement. Donald Trump news: He incited during recent past week’s capital riots and accused for this issue twice. This is the first time ever in US History. Regarding BBC Donald Trump news, this is not the first time, Donald trump is doing this and unstoppable.
